label: proof-thm-potential-operator-is-mean-square-continuous
proves_label_text: Proof of Theorem: Potential Operator is Mean-Square Continuous
proof_text: This property is established by the detailed analysis in Section 12.2, culminating in **thm-fitness-potential-mean-square-continuity**. The explicit form of $F_{\text{pot}}$ is constructed from the composition of the mean-square continuity bounds of all preceding operators.
